HTX 4.0

11/2019 - current

Goal:

Develop a system for agricultural production process managing and diary logging.

Missions:

  • Analyse the requirements.
  • Analyse and design ERD, UML, Database.
  • Design web template using Figma and Bootstrap studio.
  • Develop Frontend (web) service using ReactJs.
  • Develop Backend APIs for mobile and web service.

Technologies:

NodeJS - ExpressJs, ReactJs, Bootstrap4, MongoDb.

Live streaming video

08/2019 - 09/2019

Goal:

Develop video live-streaming web application to live-streaming the sport videos.

Missions:

  • Design web template to meet user's requirements using Figma.
  • Convert designed template to HTML by using Pug view engine and styling with SASS, CSS.

Technologies:

NodeJs - ExpressJs, Bootstrap4, MongoDb, Pug, Nginx, SASS, Parcel.

Fitness tracker

09/2019 - 11/2019

Goal:

Develop IOT healthcare system to monitor users using Mi Band 2.

Missions:

  • Make UI for: Home page, Guideline page, News paper page.
  • Develop Python program to connect with Mi Band 2.
  • Analyse and develop APIs to interact with data from Python program.
  • Develop realtime service using Socket.io to send data to browser repeatedly and immediately.
  • Crawl data to develop function: Read new healthy papers daily.

Technologies:

Python, NodeJs - ExpressJs, Socket.io, Bootstrap4, MongoDb, Puppeteer, Redis.

X - CMS

06/2019 - 07/2019

Goal:

Develop a system to manage CodersX's Facebook fanpage.

Missions:

  • Develop function to download image from DOM structure (HTML).
  • Interact with facebook GraphAPI and publishing local data to facebook page.

Technologies:

NodeJs - ExpressJs, Bootstrap4, MongoDb, Graph API.

Coders.Tokyo Cantho quiz app

Goal:

Develop a web application to play quiz.

Missions:

  • Develop quiz function.
  • Crawl quiz data from others sites.

Technologies:
